func:
var step_list = [
    "STOP",
    "PREP TANK A",
    "VENT TANK A",
    "RUN TANK A",
    "STOP TANK A",
    "DRAIN SYSTEM A",
    "PREP TANK B",
    "VENT TANK B",
    "RUN TANK B",
    "STOP TANK B",
    "DRAIN SYSTEM B"
]

if (msg.payload.data == null) { msg.payload = "UNKNOWN" }
else { msg.payload = step_list[msg.payload.data] }
return msg;
